00063 #ifndef L_DEPENDENCE_H
00064 #define L_DEPENDENCE_H
00065 
00066 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00067 #include <config.h>
00068 
00069 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00070 /*
00071  *      DEPENDENCE.
00072  */
00073 #define LDEP_MODE_ACYCLIC       0       /* include only intra-iteration arcs */
00074 #define LDEP_MODE_CYCLIC        1       /* also include inter-iteration arcs */
00075 
00076 #define LDEP_PREPASS            1
00077 #define LDEP_POSTPASS           0
00078 
00079 #define L_DEP_ANY               -1      /* match any dependence */
00080 #define L_DEP_NONE              0       /* undefined dependence (for recycle) */
00081 #define L_DEP_REG_FLOW          1       /* register flow dependence */
00082 #define L_DEP_REG_ANTI          2       /* register anti dependence */
00083 #define L_DEP_REG_OUTPUT        3       /* register output dependence */
00084 #define L_DEP_MEM_FLOW          4       /* memory flow dependence */
00085 #define L_DEP_MEM_ANTI          5       /* memory anti dependence */
00086 #define L_DEP_MEM_OUTPUT        6       /* memory output dependence */
00087 #define L_DEP_CNT               7       /* control dependence */
00088 #define L_DEP_SYNC              8       /* synchronization dependence */
00089 #define L_DEP_VLIW              9       /* vliw 0 cycle flow dependence */
00090  
00091 #define L_DEP_IGNORE_MEM_FLOW_DEP       0x1
00092 #define L_DEP_IGNORE_MEM_OUTPUT_DEP     0x2
00093 #define L_DEP_IGNORE_MEM_ANTI_DEP       0x4
00094 #define L_DEP_IGNORE_ALL_MEMORY_DEP     0x7
00095 
00096 #define L_DEP_IGNORE_REG_FLOW_DEP       0x10
00097 #define L_DEP_IGNORE_REG_OUTPUT_DEP     0x20
00098 #define L_DEP_IGNORE_REG_ANTI_DEP       0x40
00099 #define L_DEP_IGNORE_ALL_REG_DEP        0x70
00100 
00101 #define L_DEP_IGNORE_CNT_DEP            0x100
00102 
00103 
00104 #define DEP_HASH_TABLE_SIZE     1024
00105 #define DEP_HASH_MASK           (DEP_HASH_TABLE_SIZE - 1)
00106 
00107 #define DEP_MEM_OPERAND         0
00108 #define DEP_CNT_OPERAND         1
00109 #define DEP_SYNC_OPERAND        2
00110 #define DEP_VLIW_OPERAND        3
00111 
00112 typedef struct Dep_Operand  {
00113     unsigned char       ctype;
00114     unsigned char       type;
00115     unsigned char       ptype;
00116     unsigned char       uncond_def;
00117     int         value;
00118     int         index;
00119     struct L_Oper       *oper;
00120     struct Dep_Operand *next;
00121     struct Dep_Operand *prev;
00122 } Dep_Operand;
00123 
00124 #define DEP_CANT_SPECULATE          -1
00125 #define DEP_NON_EXCEPTING           0
00126 #define DEP_ALWAYS_SAFE             1
00127 #define DEP_CTL_DEP_SAFE            2
00128 #define DEP_COMPLEX_SAFE            3
00129 #define DEP_SILENT                  4
00130 #define DEP_DELAYS_EXCEPTION        5
00131 #define DEP_SAFE_STORE              6
00132 
00133 typedef struct L_Dep {
00134         int             type;           /* type of dependence arc */
00135         int             omega;          /* dependence distance in iterations */
00136         int             distance;       /* dependence latency */
00137         int             from_index;     /* index of source operand of dep arc */
00138         int             to_index;       /* index of dest operand of dep arc */
00139         struct L_Oper   *from_oper;     /* source instruction of dep arc */
00140         struct L_Oper   *to_oper;       /* dest instruction of dep arc */
00141         struct L_Dep    *next_dep;
00142 } L_Dep;
00143  
00144 typedef struct Dep_Info {
00145         int     level;
00146         int     spec_cond;
00147         struct L_Oper   *prev_branch;
00148         struct L_Oper  *post_branch;
00149         int     n_input_dep;
00150         int     n_output_dep;
00151         L_Dep   *input_dep;
00152         L_Dep   *output_dep;
00153         /* dependence internal use only */
00154         struct L_Oper *oper;
00155         struct Dep_Info *next;
00156 }  Dep_Info;
00157 
00158 #define DEP_INFO(oper)  ((Dep_Info *)(oper->dep_info))
00159

00161 extern int Ldep_alloc_target_size_dep;
00162 extern int Ldep_alloc_target_size_dep_info;
00163 extern int Ldep_alloc_target_size_dep_operand;
00164 extern int Ldep_branch_perc_limit;
00165 extern int Ldep_except_branch_perc_limit;
00166 extern int Ldep_allow_speculative_stores;
00167 extern int Ldep_allow_upward_code_perc;
00168 extern int Ldep_allow_downward_code_perc;
00169 extern int Ldep_remove_always_safe;
00170 extern int Ldep_remove_ctl_dep_safe;
00171 extern int Ldep_remove_complex_safe;
00172 extern int Ldep_hb_keep_branch_order;
00173 extern int Ldep_check_profiled_memory_dependences;
00174 extern int Ldep_allow_lat_dangles_into_jsrs;
00175 
00176 extern void     Ldep_mark_safe_invariant(L_Func *fn);
00177 extern void     Ldep_mark_safe(L_Func *fn);
00178 extern void     Ldep_init(Parm_Macro_List *);
00179 extern void     L_build_dependence_graph(L_Cb *, int, int);
00180 extern void     L_delete_dependence_graph(L_Cb *);
00181 extern void     L_compute_dependence_level(L_Cb *);
00182 extern void     L_delete_dependence_info(Dep_Info *);
00183 extern void     L_add_dep(int, int, int, int, L_Oper *, L_Oper *, int);
00184 extern void     L_remove_dep_pair(int, L_Oper *, L_Oper *);
00185 extern L_Dep    *L_remove_dep(L_Dep *, int *, int, L_Oper *, L_Oper *);
00186 extern L_Dep    *L_find_dep(L_Dep *, L_Oper *, L_Oper *, int);
00187 extern Dep_Info *L_new_dep_info();

00189 #endif
